long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get cashback for shopping online with Extrapaisa !
Browser extension Extrapaisa will remind you of the possibility to receive cashback whilst shopping. When you visit the shop, the plugin will remind you to activate the cashback so that you do not miss it.

We care about our customers. For ease of convenience with the service, we have developed a tool with useful functionality:

All shops are at your fingertips. No need to go to the website Extrapaisa. Activate the cashback in 1 click directly on the website of the shop.
